item.title: 韩国 Kospi 指数自七月峰值以来跌幅超过 20
item.description: 由于投资者准备迎接美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的大范围互惠关税生效，韩国股票基准指数下跌，延续了此前的低迷走势，目前该指数已步入熊市。【原文：South Korea’s equity benchmark dropped, extending a slump that has now put the gauge on course for a bear market, as investors prepare for US President Donald Trump’s wide-ranging reciprocal tariffs to take effect.】

item.title: 韩元跌至 2009 年以来最低，亚洲货币下跌
item.description: 在亚洲贸易敏感货币普遍下跌的背景下，韩元跌至全球金融危机以来的最低点。【原文：The Korean won declined to its lowest since the global financial crisis amid a broad decline in Asia’s trade-sensitive currencies.】

item.title: 贸易战深化，中国推动黄金 ETF 流入创纪录
item.description: 在全球最大经济体的贸易战言论震撼全球市场之际，中国投资者上周向黄金支持的交易所交易基金注入了创纪录数量的现金。【原文：Chinese investors funneled a record amount of cash into gold-backed exchange-traded funds last week, drawn by the safety of the asset as combative trade war rhetoric from the world’s biggest economies shakes global markets.】

item.title: 亚行称美国关税将对亚洲经济产生重大影响
item.description: 亚洲开发银行将进一步下调对亚洲经济增长的预测，因为该地区受美国关税的打击最为严重。【原文：The Asian Development Bank will lower its growth forecast for Asia further after the region was hit the hardest by tariffs from the US.】

item.title: 康卡斯特将在英国推进环球主题公园项目
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.）表示，在获得英国政府的必要批准后，该公司将继续计划在英国建造其首个欧洲主题公园。【原文：Comcast Corp. said it will proceed with plans to build its first European theme park in the UK after getting necessary approvals from the government there.】

item.title: 韩国为受关税影响的汽车行业提供 20 亿美元援助
item.description: 韩国为其汽车工业推出了价值 3 万亿韩元（20 亿美元）的一揽子紧急资金，以减轻美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税打击。【原文：South Korea unveiled a package of emergency funding worth 3 trillion won ($2 billion) for its automobile industry to soften the blow from US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 国债收益率飙升引发对下一次大规模基础交易平仓的担忧
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战冲击金融市场，一个令人不安的事态发展正在开始显现：美国国债非但没有提供避风港，反而突然失去了避风港的吸引力。【原文：An unnerving development is starting to unfold as President Donald Trump’s trade war hammers financial markets: US Treasuries, far from offering shelter from the turmoil, are suddenly losing their haven appeal.】

item.title: 研究发现：英国最贫困人口从公共服务中获益 1.6 万英镑
item.description: 根据决议基金会（Resolution Foundation）的分析，最贫困的英国人从公共服务中获得的 "实物福利 "比最富有的人多出 53%，但他们对所获得的福利却不太满意。【原文：The poorest Britons receive 53% more “benefits-in-kind” from public services than the wealthiest but are less satisfied with what they get, according to analysis by the Resolution Foundation.】

item.title: 新关税威胁需求，石油进一步跌破 60 美元
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将对许多中国商品征收104%的惩罚性关税后，石油在周三的早盘交易中进一步跌破60美元，贸易战愈演愈烈，有可能打击全球能源需求。【原文：Oil slid deeper below $60 in early trade on Wednesday, after US President Donald Trump said he would push forward with punitive 104% tariffs on many Chinese goods, intensifying a trade war that threatens to batter global energy demand.】

item.title: 关税的作用：谁来支付、谁来征收以及关税为何会提高价格
item.description: 随着美国关税的激增开始重新定义美国的贸易关系，美国消费者正在接受一堂关于进口税如何运作的速成课程。以下是基本知识。【原文：As radical increases in US tariffs begin to redefine the country’s trading relationships, American consumers are getting a crash course in how taxes on imports work. Here are the basics.】

item.title: 美国股市剧烈波动，日本股市将继续下跌
item.description: 在美国全面实施贸易关税之前，华尔街的剧烈波动削弱了投资者的信心，日本股市必将下跌。【原文：Japanese stocks are set to fall as wild swings on Wall Street sap investor confidence ahead of the full implementation of US trade tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普征收关税的最后期限临近，美国期货价格暴跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于白宫誓言要对贸易伙伴全面征收关税，包括对中国征收104%的关税，美国股指期货暴跌，亚洲交易商也在为大幅走低做准备。【原文：US stock futures slumped and Asian traders were bracing for sharp moves lower as the White House vowed to push ahead with sweeping tariffs on trading partners including a 104% levy on China.】

item.title: 安格鲁煤矿爆炸事件后，皮博迪审查价值 38 亿美元的煤炭交易
item.description: 在澳大利亚一家煤矿发生点火事件后，皮博迪能源公司（Peabody Energy Corp.【原文：Peabody Energy Corp. is reviewing a deal worth up to $3.78 billion to buy Anglo American Plc’s steel-making coal business after an ignition event at an Australian mine.】

item.title: 乌拉圭将关键利率提高至 9.25%，释放鹰派政策信号
item.description: 乌拉圭央行周二将基准利率上调至 9.25%，发出了将消费价格涨幅和通胀预期降至 4.5% 目标的鹰派信号。【原文：Uruguay’s central bank raised its benchmark interest rate Tuesday to 9.25%, sending a hawkish signal about lowering consumer price increases and inflation expectations to its 4.5% target.】

item.title: 零售商 At Home 正在洽谈将控制权移交给贷款人的可能性
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，At Home 集团公司正在与一些贷款人讨论债务重组方案，有可能将这家陷入困境的零售商的控制权交给债权人。【原文：At Home Group Inc. is discussing a debt-restructuring proposal with some of its lenders that could potentially hand control of the troubled retailer to creditors, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 对冲基金招聘新员工进军动荡的亚洲电力市场
item.description: 对冲基金也加入了在亚洲寻找电力交易人才的行列，它们进军该地区日益活跃和动荡的电力市场，旨在抵消主要大宗商品利润的下滑。【原文：Hedge funds have joined the hunt for power-trading talent in Asia, as they push into the region’s increasingly active and volatile electricity markets with the aim of offsetting declining profits from mainstay commodities.】

item.title: 中国地方政府融资机构年初净融资额创下新低
item.description: 长期以来，中国一直在努力管理债务，部分原因是为了能够经受住市场动荡的考验，比如目前由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税引发的市场动荡。地方政府融资工具一直是关注的焦点之一，最近的数据显示其借贷已经放缓。【原文：China has long grappled with managing debt, in part so it can weather market turbulence like the current bout sparked by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs. Local government financing vehicles have been one focus, and recent data show their borrowing has slowed.】

item.title: 马斯克在投资者起诉 Twitter 收购案中缺席取证
item.description: 据一份法庭文件显示，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在一起投资者诉讼案中顶住了飞往华盛顿对他进行宣誓质询的律师，该诉讼指控马斯克在 2022 年收购推特公司（Twitter Inc.【原文：Elon Musk stood up attorneys who flew to Washington to question him under oath in an investor suit alleging his on-again off-again move to buy Twitter Inc. in 2022 was a bid to manipulate its stock price, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 两天内收益率飙升 58 个基点，市政债券销售被推迟
item.description: 周二，一些州政府和地方政府的债务交易被推迟，该资产类别在周二出现了第二个痛苦的交易时段。【原文：A number of state and local government debt deals were postponed on Tuesday, as the asset class recorded a second painful trading session.】

item.title: 富时指数预计 2026 年 11 月将韩国纳入债券指数
item.description: 富时罗素（FTSE Russell）周二表示，该指数提供商将在 2026 年 11 月之前把韩国政府债券纳入其旗舰债务指数。【原文：FTSE Russell will include South Korean government bonds in its flagship debt index by November 2026, the index provider said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）执行董事会力争周五就阿根廷计划进行表决
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，国际货币基金组织执行董事会打算在周五讨论并可能批准一项新的阿根廷融资计划。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board intends to discuss and likely approve on Friday a new financing program for Argentina, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: S&P 大起大落，股市波动率再次飙升
item.description: 周二，股市波动率创下新高，Cboe 波动率指数连续第二个交易日波动超过 20 点。【原文：Stock market volatility hit new levels Tuesday, with the Cboe Volatility Index swinging more than 20 points for a second straight session.】

item.title: 市场平静被打破，暴跌肆虐华尔街
item.description: 一天来，随着美国股市在亚洲和欧洲股市强劲反弹的基础上继续上扬，唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战所引发的恐慌似乎已基本平息。【原文：For the better part of a day, it seemed as if the panic that Donald Trump’s trade war unleashed had largely subsided as US equities built on strong rallies in Asia and Europe.】

item.title: 关税加剧对冲基金利率押注的崩溃
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策引发的动荡正在加速对冲基金的崩溃，对冲基金普遍认为国债将比利率掉期表现更好。【原文：The upheaval from President Donald Trump’s tariffs is accelerating the collapse of a popular hedge-fund bet that Treasuries would perform better than interest-rate swaps.】

item.title: 投资者套现石油熊市基金，2020 年以来最大动作
item.description: 一种与石油市场下跌挂钩的交易所交易产品刚刚出现了 2020 年以来最大的资金外流。随着原油价格跌至四年来的最低点，一些投资者撤出该基金，以兑现利润。【原文：An exchange-traded product tied to declines in the oil market just saw its biggest outflow of funds since 2020. With crude prices crashing to a four-year low, some investors pulled out of the fund to cash in on profits.】

item.title: 丰业银行首席执行官希望加拿大大选出现多数派政府
item.description: 面对华盛顿的贸易战，加拿大两大政党在联邦大选中针锋相对，新斯科舍银行首席执行官明确表示：最好的结果是一党控制局面，将不确定性抛在脑后。【原文：As Canada’s two major political parties come to a head in the federal election in the face of Washington’s trade war, Bank of Nova Scotia’s chief executive officer is making it clear: the best outcome would be one party in control, leaving the uncertainty behind.】

item.title: KKR 接近达成以超过 25 亿欧元收购 Karo 的交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.即将收购 Karo Healthcare，这笔交易对这家瑞典消费者保健企业的估值可能超过 25 亿欧元（约合 27 亿美元）。【原文：KKR & Co. is close to acquiring Karo Healthcare in a deal that could value the Swedish consumer-health business at more than €2.5 billion ($2.7 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国特使认为叛军撤离后阿尔法明将重新开放刚果锡矿
item.description: 一位美国高级官员表示，在卢旺达支持的叛军撤出位于刚果民主共和国的世界最大锡矿之一后，阿尔法明资源公司（Alphamin Resources Corp.【原文：Alphamin Resources Corp. could soon resume operations at one of the world’s biggest tin mines located in the Democratic Republic of the Congo after Rwanda-backed rebels withdrew from the area, a top US official said.】
